sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RESINA a town of Italy, in the kingdom of Naples, on the sea-shore. It is situated near to Portici, and is built on the ruins of Herculaneum, at the foot of Mount Vesuvius, and in the way by which it is commonly ascended. It contains about 7700 inhabitants, who are mostly cultivators of vines, and produce the wine lachryma Christi.
